doc.title: Video One
doc.plot: A weekly music video show dedicated to the sound of the famous New Wave station KROQ in Los Angeles, and the videos of the week, a countdown of the KROQ Top-5 videos. There would be guest interviews, most notably when an artist would be performing at the Universal Ampitheatre or the Hollywood Palladium (such as Duran Duran, Adam Ant, Frankie Goes To Hollywood, Tears For fears, Culture Club, Billy Idol, General Public, Berlin, and many more)
